00034 template<typename Point>
00035 class WSP
00036 {
00037   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00038   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::iterator PItr;
00039   typedef comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* index;
00040 
00041 public:
00042 
00043   //Before the BCCP is computed, first and last point
00044   //To the quad-tree boxes that make up the WSP
00045   //After BCCP is computed, they point to the two points
00046   //that make up the BCCP
00054   void* first;
00062   void* second;
00067   double bccp_dist;
00071   WSP()
00072   {    bccp_dist = -1;
00073   };
00074 
00080   WSP(index f, index s) : first(f), second(s)
00081   {
00082 
00083     //We store the marginal distance as a negative to indicate
00084     //That we haven't computed the actual BCCP yet
00085     bccp_dist = -dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(f,s);
00086     if(bccp_dist == 0)
00087       {
00088         std::cout << std::endl << "Error in WSP construction!" << std::endl;
00089         std::cout << (*(f->low))[0] << "," << (*(f->low))[1]  << std::endl;
00090         std::cout << (*(s->low))[0] << "," << (*(s->low))[1] << std::endl;
00091         if(f==s)
00092           std::cout << "F==S!" << std::endl;
00093         exit(0);
00094       }
00095   };
00096   
00100   long int size()
00101   {
00102     if(bccp_done())
00103       return 0;
00104     //std::cout << "bccp_dist: " << bccp_dist << std::endl;
00105     return (((index)first)->hig-((index)first)->low)+(((index) second)->hig-((index) second)->low);
00106   };
00107 
00111   double get_bccp_dist() const
00112   {
00113     return (double) fabs(bccp_dist);
00114   }
00115 
00119   bool bccp_done() const
00120   {
00121     return bccp_dist >= 0;
00122   }
00123 
00127   WSP<Point>& operator=(const WSP<Point> b)
00128   {
00129     first = b.first;
00130     second = b.second;
00131     bccp_dist = b.bccp_dist;
00132     return *this;
00133   }
00134 
00140   void bccp()
00141   {
00142     if(bccp_done())
00143       return;    
00144     //Note: After BCCP is computed, the void* first and second
00145     //point to Points, not comp_quad_tree_nodes
00146     
00147     //For small sized quad-tree boxes, 
00148     //Brute force computation of BCCP is faster
00149     if(size() < 32)
00150       {
00151         brute_force_bccp((index)first, (index)second);
00152         return;
00153       }
00154 
00155     //For small sized boxes, compute using 
00156     //recursive algorithm
00157     do_bccp();
00158     return;
00159   };
00160 private:
00161   //Compute the BCCP by brute force
00162   //Note: This works well because
00163   //the points in the quad-tree boxes
00164   //are already in a contiguous chunk the the
00165   //z-order sorted point list
00166   void brute_force_bccp(index l, index r)
00167   {
00168     double dist;
00169     bccp_dist = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
00170     for(PItr i=l->low;i != l->hig;i+=1)
00171       {
00172         for(PItr j=r->low;j != r->hig;j+=1)
00173           {
00174             dist = i->sqr_dist(*j);
00175             if(dist < bccp_dist)
00176               {
00177                 bccp_dist=dist;
00178                 first=&*i;
00179                 second=&*j;
00180               }
00181           }
00182       }
00183   };
00184   
00185   //Recursive BCCP computation.
00186   //Decends the compressed quadtree and 
00187   //computes the bccp
00188   void bccp_recurse(index r, index l)
00189   {
00190     double d1, d2;
00191     index t;
00192     if((r->length==0) && (l->length==0))
00193       {
00194         d1 = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(r, l);
00195         if(d1 < bccp_dist)
00196           {
00197             bccp_dist=d1;
00198             first=&*(r->low);
00199             second=&*(l->low);
00200           }
00201         return;
00202       }
00203     if(r->length < l->length)
00204       {
00205         t=l;
00206         l=r;
00207         r=t;
00208       }
00209 
00210     d1 = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(r->left, l);
00211     d2 = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(r->right, l);
00212 
00213     if(d1 < d2)
00214       {
00215         if(d1 < bccp_dist)
00216           {
00217             bccp_recurse(r->left, l);
00218           }
00219         if(d2 < bccp_dist)
00220           {
00221             bccp_recurse(r->right, l);
00222           }
00223       }
00224     else
00225       {
00226         if(d2 < bccp_dist)
00227           {
00228             bccp_recurse(r->right, l);
00229           }
00230         if(d1 < bccp_dist)
00231           {
00232             bccp_recurse(r->left, l);
00233           }
00234       }
00235   }
00236 
00237   //compute the bi-chromatic closest pair from two well seperated ranges
00238   void do_bccp()
00239   {
00240     bccp_dist = ((index)first)->low->sqr_dist(*(((index)second)->low));
00241     index f,s;
00242     f = (index) first;
00243     s = (index) second;
00244     first = &*(f->low);
00245     second = &*(s->low);
00246     bccp_recurse(f,s);
00247   }
00248 };
00249 
00253 template<typename Point>
00254 class pwspd
00255 {
00256 public:
00257   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00258   typedef comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* Node;
00259   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::iterator PItr;
00260   typedef std::pair<PItr, PItr> Edge;
00261   
00267   pwspd(std::vector<Point> &P, double S=2) : Points(P), cqtree(P)
00268   {
00269     setSpread(S);
00270   }
00274   ~pwspd()
00275   {
00276   };
00277   
00283   void setSpread(double S)
00284   {
00285     spread=S*S;
00286   };
00287 
00288   /* Get Spread
00289      \brief returns the spread of the WSPD
00290   */
00291   double getSpread()
00292   {
00293     return sqrt(spread);
00294   };
00295   
00301   void run(std::vector<WSP<Point> > &Wsp, int num_threads=1)
00302   {
00303     int i;
00304     int tid=0;
00305     std::vector<size_type> Wsp_size;
00306     std::vector<std::vector<WSP<Point> > > wsp;
00307     wsp.resize(num_threads);
00308 #ifdef _OPENMP
00309     omp_set_num_threads(num_threads);
00310 #pragma omp parallel private(i, tid) shared(wsp)
00311     {
00312       tid = omp_get_thread_num();
00313 #pragma omp for schedule(static)
00314 #endif
00315       for(i=1;i < (int) cqtree.size()/2;++i)
00316         {
00317           decomp(&cqtree[i], 
00318                  wsp[tid]);
00319         }
00320 #ifdef _OPENMP
00321 #pragma omp barrier
00322 #pragma omp single
00323       {
00324 #endif
00325         Wsp_size.resize(num_threads);
00326         Wsp_size[0]=0;
00327         for(i=1;i < num_threads;++i)
00328           {
00329             Wsp_size[i] = wsp[i-1].size()+Wsp_size[i-1];
00330           }
00331         Wsp.resize(Wsp_size[i-1]+wsp[i-1].size());
00332 #ifdef _OPENMP
00333       } //End single section
00334 #pragma omp for schedule(static,1)
00335 #endif
00336       for(i=0;i < num_threads;++i)
00337         {
00338           memcpy(&(Wsp[Wsp_size[i]]), &(wsp[i][0]),
00339                  sizeof(WSP<Point>)*wsp[i].size());
00340         }
00341 #ifdef _OPENMP
00342     } //End parallel section
00343 #endif
00344   };
00345   
00349   std::vector<Point> &Points;  
00353   comp_quad_tree<Point> cqtree;
00354 private:
00355   double spread;
00356   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00357   void decomp(const Node node,
00358               std::vector<WSP<Point> > &wsp)
00359   {
00360     
00361     if(node->left->length == 0)
00362       {
00363         if(node->right->length == 0)
00364           {
00365             if(node->left->low->sqr_dist(*(node->right->low)) > 0)
00366               {
00367                 WSP<Point> c(node->left, node->right);
00368                 wsp.push_back(c);
00369               }
00370           }
00371         else
00372           {
00373             recursive_decomp_p(node->left, node->right, wsp);
00374           }
00375       }
00376     else
00377       {
00378         if(node->right->length == 0)
00379           {
00380             recursive_decomp_p(node->right, node->left, wsp);
00381           }
00382         else
00383           {
00384             recursive_decomp(node->left, node->right, wsp);
00385           }
00386       }
00387   };
00388   void recursive_decomp(const Node left, const Node right,
00389                         std::vector<WSP<Point> > &wsp)
00390   {
00391     double max_radius, dist, radius_l, radius_r;
00392 
00393     radius_l=left->length;
00394     radius_r=right->length;
00395     dist = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(left,
00396                                       right);
00397 
00398     max_radius = (radius_l>radius_r)?radius_l:radius_r;
00399     if(dist > (spread*max_radius))
00400       {
00401         WSP<Point> c(left, right);
00402         wsp.push_back(c);
00403         return;
00404       }
00405     
00406     if(radius_l == max_radius)
00407       {
00408         if(left->left->length == 0)
00409           {
00410             recursive_decomp_p(left->left, right, wsp);
00411           }
00412         else
00413           recursive_decomp(left->left, right, wsp);
00414 
00415         if(left->right->length == 0)
00416           {
00417             recursive_decomp_p(left->right, right, wsp);
00418           }
00419         else
00420           recursive_decomp(left->right, right, wsp);
00421         return;
00422       }
00423     if(right->left->length == 0)
00424       {
00425         recursive_decomp_p(right->left, left, wsp);
00426       }
00427     else
00428       recursive_decomp(right->left, left, wsp);
00429 
00430     if(right->right->length == 0)
00431       {
00432         recursive_decomp_p(right->right, left, wsp);
00433       }
00434     else
00435       recursive_decomp(right->right, left, wsp);
00436     return;
00437   };
00438 
00439   void recursive_decomp_p(const Node p, const Node node,
00440                           std::vector<WSP<Point> > &wsp)
00441   {
00442     
00443     double dist;
00444     double radius;
00445     dist = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(p, node);
00446     radius = node->length;
00447     if(dist > (spread*radius))
00448       {
00449         WSP<Point> c(p, node);
00450         wsp.push_back(c);
00451         return;
00452       }
00453     if(node->left->length == 0)
00454       {
00455         WSP<Point> c(p, node->left);
00456         wsp.push_back(c);
00457       }
00458     else
00459       {
00460         recursive_decomp_p(p, node->left, wsp);
00461       }
00462 
00463     if(node->right->length == 0)
00464       {
00465         WSP<Point> c(p, node->right);
00466         wsp.push_back(c);
00467       }
00468     else
00469       {
00470         recursive_decomp_p(p, node->right, wsp);
00471       }
00472   };
00473 
00474 };
00475 #endif
